channel.title: [PI] Crossbow Question
channel.description: First; I added chaotic crossbow to my server and client. I added it in my server wherever I found the rune crossbow code. Eg. [code]boolean usingCross = (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 9185) || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15041);[/code] However, when I try using any type of bolts with the chaotic xbow, I get a msg that says "You cannot use (bolts) with chaotic crossbow". I found that instance in my CA class; [code]if(correctBowAndArrows() < c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows] && Config.CORRECT_ARROWS && usingBow && !usingCrystalBow() && (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 9185 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 15041)) {[/code] EDIT: the rune crossbow now gives me the same message. Any ideas/thoughts?

item.title: [PI] Crossbow Question
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

First; I added chaotic crossbow to my server and client. I added it in my server wherever I found the rune crossbow code. Eg.

boolean usingCross = (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 9185) || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15041);

However, when I try using any type of bolts with the chaotic xbow, I get a msg that says “You cannot use (bolts) with chaotic crossbow”. I found that instance in my CA class;

if(correctBowAndArrows() < c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows] && Config.CORRECT_ARROWS && usingBow && !usingCrystalBow() && (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 9185 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 15041)) {

EDIT: the rune crossbow now gives me the same message.
Any ideas/thoughts?

Read full topic
